analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0xb2f1db990391cf852c982ece7fa67a143ae37c37.sol#203-219) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb2f1db990391cf852c982ece7fa67a143ae37c37.sol#217)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0xb2f1db990391cf852c982ece7fa67a143ae37c37.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/30/0xb2f1db990391cf852c982ece7fa67a143ae37c37.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/30/0xb2f1db990391cf852c982ece7fa67a143ae37c37.sol#51-52) is not in mixedCase
